memoryresize.comment: Initial memory resize (size0) and the following memory resizes according to initial inlet/outlet particles (default=2 and 4)

useboxlimit.comment: In/out process is only applied to InOut zones delimited by BoxLimit (default=true)

freecentre.comment: Centre of zone where InOut is not applied (default=centre of simulation domain)

determlimit.comment: Use 1e-3 for first_order or 1e+3 for zeroth_order (default=1e+3)

extrapolatemode.comment: Calculation mode for rhop and velocity extrapolation from ghost nodes 1:fast-single, 2:single, 3:double (default=1)

refilling.comment: Refilling mode. 0:Simple full, 1:Simple below zsurf, 2:Advanced for reverse flows (very slow) (default=1)

inputtreatment.comment: Treatment of fluid entering the zone. 0:No changes, 1:Convert fluid (necessary for outlet), 2:Remove fluid (recommended for inlet)

imposerhop.comment: Outlet rhop 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Hydrostatic, 2:Extrapolated from ghost nodes (default=0)

refilling.comment: Refilling mode. 0:Simple full, 1:Simple below zsurf, 2:Advanced for reverse flows (very slow) (default=1)

inputtreatment.comment: Treatment of fluid entering the zone. 0:No changes, 1:Convert fluid (necessary for outlet), 2:Remove fluid (recommended for inlet)

imposerhop.comment: Outlet rhop 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Hydrostatic, 2:Extrapolated from ghost nodes (default=0)

useboxlimit.comment: In/out process is only applied to InOut zones delimited by BoxLimit (default=true)

determlimit.comment: Use 1e-3 for first_order or 1e+3 for zeroth_order (default=1e+3)

extrapolatemode.comment: Calculation mode for rhop and velocity extrapolation from ghost nodes 1:fast-single, 2:single, 3:double (default=1)

useboxlimit.comment: In/out process is only applied to InOut zones delimited by BoxLimit (default=true)

determlimit.comment: Use 1e-3 for first_order or 1e+3 for zeroth_order (default=1e+3)

extrapolatemode.comment: Calculation mode for rhop and velocity extrapolation from ghost nodes 1:fast-single, 2:single, 3:double (default=1)

imposevelocity.comment: Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)
Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)

gridveldata.comment: CSV file with velocity data in different times and positions

imposevelocity.comment: Imposed velocity 0:fixed value, 1:variable value, 2:Extrapolated velocity, 3:Interpolated velocity (default=0)

flowvelocity.comment: Velocity values are read as flow [l/s] and ratio is used to compute particle volume (ratio*dp^3).

imposerhop.comment: Outlet rhop 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Hydrostatic, 2:Extrapolated from ghost nodes (default=0)
Outlet rhop 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Hydrostatic, 2:Extrapolated from ghost nodes (default=0)
Outlet rhop 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Hydrostatic, 2:Extrapolated from ghost nodes (default=0)

imposezsurf.comment: Inlet Z-surface 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Imposed variable value, 2:Calculated from fluid domain (default=0)

zsurf.comment: Characteristic inlet Z-surface (used for Hydrostatic option)

remove.comment: Removes particles above the Zsurf limit (default=false)

imposezsurf.comment: Inlet Z-surface 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Imposed variable value, 2:Calculated from fluid domain (default=0)

savevtk.comment: Creates VTK files with Zsurf for each PART (default=false)

remove.comment: Removes particles above the Zsurf limit (default=false)

zsurftimes.comment: Characteristic inlet Z-Surf changes in time

imposezsurf.comment: Inlet Z-surface 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Imposed variable value, 2:Calculated from fluid domain (default=0)

savevtk.comment: Creates VTK files with Zsurf for each PART (default=false)

remove.comment: Removes particles above the Zsurf limit (default=false)

imposezsurf.comment: Inlet Z-surface 0:Imposed fixed value, 1:Imposed variable value, 2:Calculated from fluid domain (default=0)

savevtk.comment: Creates VTK files with Zsurf for each PART (default=false)

remove.comment: Removes particles above the Zsurf limit (default=false)

zsurfmin.comment: Minimum Z-surface to reduce the calculation area (default=minimun Z inlet)

zsurffit.comment: Reduction of calculated zsurf with explicit value (value) or according to dp (valuedp) (default vdp=0.5)
